description: Rules for managing the complete lifecycle of tasks
content:
# Task Lifecycle Rules

## Task Creation
- Create feature branch from main/develop
- Create task directory in .agent/state/tasks/
- Initialize all required task files
- Set task status in manifest.md
- Update active.md if needed
- Document initial plan

## Task Execution
- Follow task plan phases
- Update progress after each step
- Document questions and answers
- Record key decisions
- Maintain security documentation
- Update context files as needed

## Task Completion
- Verify all requirements met
- Complete all documentation
- Update task status
- Clean up temporary files
- Archive task if needed
- Merge feature branch to main/develop
- Synchronize all context files
- Update architecture.md
- Update tools.md
- Update security.md
- Update principles.md
- Verify documentation consistency

## Task Blocking
- Document blocking issues
- Update task status
- Create recovery plan
- Notify if human intervention needed
- Maintain progress state
- Update documentation status
